summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power system and providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property in Brookvale Garden Tracts (Vol. 10 of Plats, page 47), Interurban Addition to Seattle (Vol. 10 of Plats, page 55) and in the south one-half of Section 23, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W. M. for a site for a receiving and distribution substation.
